comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: genforum.genealogy.com/cgi-bin/print.cgi?harvey::2997.html mentions a John Glover Lee in this regiment and company.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks swanq. There is certainly a good possibility that this is John Glover Lee of the Appomattox Greys.  Since he survived the war, it would be nice to find some visual confirmation.
